patthana9.10:1.1: Naāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanoāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.10:2.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.10:3.1: Nasāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.10:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.10:5.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naāsavavippayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.10:6.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.10:7.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.10:8.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.10:9.1: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.10:11.1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.10:12.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
